::KitKat::

She was getting bored and restless.  Since the mouse was back, she 
figured that she could go out.  She ran out of the base in wolf mode 
and headed into the woods.  She ran though the forest with ease.  it 
felt great to be free running again.  She kept running untill she 
came to an abrupt stop.  She smelled something.  She sniffed the air 
again.  Wolves, she thought.  She could smell other wolves about.  
She couldn't tell if they were bot or not, the scent was too faint.  
But deniably wolf.  She followed her nose through the trees hoping to 
find them.  If they were a real pack, she might try to join them for 
a while.  She needed to be with a real pack again.  Her instinct for 
being in a pack were strong.  She had survived for a long time as a 
single wolf.  But she yurned to be in a pack again.
